content.text: Are you a Data Engineer looking for new challenges?
At Ceibo we are looking for you! We continue to grow and we are looking to add a Data Engineer to our team to work on global projects.
Responsibilities:

items: Manage and prepare data for use
Analyze and process data, and ensure optimal performance of data and analytics systems
Manage data models
Work with different data sources and create ways to extract data from the sources, as well as import and modify it to suit the needs of the organization.

content.text: Requirements:

items: Two years of previous experience as a data engineer
Graduate or undergraduate degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field
Experience in ETL process development
Database management (Postgress, Oracle, MSSQL, Mongo, MySQL, etc)
Advanced SQL knowledge
Experience working with Data Lakes and Data Warehouses
Agile methodology

content.text: Desirable:

items: Azure Data Factory
Azure DataBricks
Azure Synapse
Key Vault

Are you a Full Stack Senior Developer and are you looking for new challenges?
At Ceibo Digital we are looking for you! ðŸ™Œ
Responsibilities
As a Full Stack Senior Developer you will be part of innovative, high impact, challenging and agile projects, being responsible for:

items: Actively participate in all phases of the software development lifecycle
Participate in the development and implementation of new products
Collaborate in the design of solutions at backend and frontend level
Build code complying with standards and quality requirements
Work with integrations to other systems
Perform peer code reviews and technical documentation

content.text: Requirements:
We are in search of an experienced Senior Full Stack Developer who meets most of the technical requirements listed below:
Are you a Marketing Automation Specialist or a recent graduate looking for new challenges in Digital Marketing?
At CEIBO we are looking for you! ðŸ™Œ
We continue growing and expanding, and so we invite you to apply to join our team and work on projects across the world.
Profile

We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Marketing automation analyst and specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing and optimizing our automated Marketing campaigns using Oracle Responsys and Eloqua. The Marketing automation analyst and specialist will work closely with Ceibo teams and our clients to ensure the effective implementation of our strategies and the successful execution of personalized, data-driven campaigns.
Key Responsibilities:

items: Configure, implement, execute and maintain automated Marketing campaigns in Oracle Responsys and Eloqua.
Collaborate with Ceibo and the clientâ€™s team to develop effective automation strategies that drive customer engagement, conversion and retention.
Segment and manage contact databases to ensure delivery of relevant
and personalized messages.
Perform A/B testing and analyze results to continuously improve campaign effectiveness.
Monitor and analyze key performance metrics (KPIs) to evaluate the success of campaigns and provide reports and recommendations to relevant teams.
Keep up-to-date on Marketing automation best practices and the latest Oracle Responsys and Eloqua features and updates.
Collaborate with other teams to ensure integration and consistency of automated marketing efforts across channels and platforms.
Identify opportunities for improvement and optimization in workflow and processes related to Marketing communications automation.

content.text: Requirements:

items: (Analyst) Should be a recent graduate from Marketing, Advertising, Communication and related careers
(Specialist) Should be an experienced professional with a degree in Marketing, Advertising, Communication and related careers
Possess excellent oral and written communication and organizational skills.
Strong understanding of marketing automation principles and best practices, including database segmentation, message personalization and workflow automation.
Strong knowledge of Digital Marketing and understanding of various online marketing channels.
Strong analytical skills with experience measuring and analyzing Marketing metrics.
Ability to work in a team environment and collaborate effectively with various stakeholders.
Meticulous attention to detail and ability to work in a fast-paced, agile environment.

content.text: Benefits:

items: Competitive compensation commensurate with experience and skills.
Opportunities for growth, training and professional development.
Collaborative and dynamic work environment.
Home Office (days to be arranged)

content.text: Are you a Paid Media specialist or a recent graduate looking for new challenges in Digital Marketing?
At CEIBO we are looking for you! ðŸ™Œ
We continue growing and expanding, and so we invite you to apply to joinour team and work on projects across the world.
Profile

We are looking for a highly analytical and results-driven performance specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for optimizing and improving the performance of our online marketing and advertising campaigns (Google, Meta, LinkedIn, etc.). The Paid Media Specialist and the Paid Media Analyst will use analytics and tracking tools, conduct tests and experiments, and provide strategic recommendations to maximize the efficiency and impact of our Digital Marketing initiatives.
Key Responsibilities:

items: Develop digital Marketing strategies from a technical point of view aligned with stated objectives.
Manage data related to the marketing plan and strategy.
Set up campaigns defined in the strategy, in different organic or paid media.
Connect multiple analytics platforms into a single report for each campaign in Data Studio (Looker), Power BI or Tableau.
Work in a dynamic environment with international clients and high volume of campaigns.

content.text: Requirements:

items: [Specialist]: Working experience of +5 years (exclusive), implementing digital media campaigns (Google Ads, Facebook Ads, etc.)
[Analyst]: Graduates in Engineering, Administration, Economics,
Marketing, Communication or similar (exclusive)
Excellent interpersonal skills
Analytical, decisive and autonomous profile
Advanced Excel skills
Extensive working knowledge of Google Analytics, Tag Manager and Data Studio (Looker)
Knowledge of HTML5 and CSS
Advanced level of English

content.text: Desirable requirements:

items: Knowledge of SEO
Knowledge of Business Intelligence Software such as QlikView or Tableau (It is a plus)
Knowledge of a keyword research tool such as Semrush, Ubersuggest or SE Ranking
Understanding of common web technologies (SQL, Python, JS, PHP.)

content.text: Benefits:

items: Competitive compensation commensurate with experience and skills.
Opportunities for growth, training and professional development.
Collaborative and dynamic work environment.
Home Office (number of days to be agreed upon).
